title: Which writing style is the most effective for business writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Business writing is a purposeful and economical writing style. Make your points in a logical sequence. No fluff. The structure goes something like this. 1: Tell them what you are going to tell them. 2: Tell them. 3: Tell them what you told them. Business writing has a purpose. Begin with objective in mind. Ensure you tell a story weaving in facts and context that compels the audience to take the desired action.
